data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlas close to the penalty box.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Pachuca.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 8, Atlas's Luciano Acosta breaks free at Estadio Jalisco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
In the minute 12, Lorenzo Reyes of Atlas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Jalisco.
Ignacio Jeraldino of Atlas is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 15, Ignacio Jeraldino for the home team is judged to be offside.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 17, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Pachuca throw-in in Atlas's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 19, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Jalisco.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 22, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pachuca are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 27, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Atlas.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Ignacio Jeraldino (Atlas) has received a yellow card from Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Can Atlas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pachuca's half?
In the minute 31, Pachuca needs to be cautious. Atlas have an attacking throw-in.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 36, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Pachuca.
Hugo Nervo (Atlas) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 37, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Atlas a goal kick.
Jesus Isijara for Atlas drives towards goal at Estadio Jalisco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Pachuca are coming forward and Felipe Pardo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Atlas.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Pachuca, close to Atlas's area.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Pachuca's Victor Sosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
In the minute 48, In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hugo Nervo for Atlas gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Atlas.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Atlas throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Pachuca's Victor Sosa misses with an attempt on goal.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Atlas a goal kick.
Pachuca's Victor Davila has been booked in Guadalajara.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pachuca have a dangerous throw-in.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Miguel Herrera.
At Estadio Jalisco, Luciano Acosta is shown a red card and sent off.
Victor Guzman (Pachuca) has replaced the possibly injured Miguel Herrera at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 63, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Atlas have a goal kick.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Atlas in Guadalajara.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Atlas throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Atlas a goal kick.
Pachuca make their second substitution with Romario Ibarra replacing Victor Davila.
In the minute 69, Roberto de la Rosa is replacing Felipe Pardo for Pachuca at Estadio Jalisco.
Free kick for Atlas in the half of Pachuca.
Kevin Alvarez for Pachuca has been booked by Eduardo Galvan Basulto and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Renato Ibarra is replacing Jesus Isijara for the home team.
Throw-in for Atlas close to the penalty box.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Atlas, close to Pachuca's area.
In the minute 73, Atlas have a goal kick.
Pachuca have been given a penalty...
Goal! Victor Guzman gives Pachuca a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Free kick Atlas.
Diego Cocca (Atlas) is making a second substitution, with Edyairth Ortega replacing Angel Marquez.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Atlas in the half of Pachuca.
Atlas are pushing forward but Renato Ibarra's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Ignacio Jeraldino with Brayan Trejo. This is the third substitution made today by Diego Cocca.
Pachuca drives forward and Victor Guzman gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Pachuca in Guadalajara.
Roberto Nurse is on a sub for Victor Sosa for Pachuca.
Paulo Pezzolano is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Josue Gomez Del Rosal replacing Cristian Souza.
In the minute 88, Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Atlas.
In Guadalajara Pachuca attack through Roberto de la Rosa. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Jalisco.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
The match has come to a close in Guadalajara. The final score is 0-1.
